name: Shadow night funkin
description:
Ever wanted to have a rap battle with the one and only VLC Protogen?

Well You can do it now in this majestic FNF Rip off

Stunning 3D visuals and a bad chart

This can all be yours right now


-This was meant as an April fools joke but it got delayed bit some stuff
Have fun
